metadata.name: Suspicious Process Start Locations
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious process run from unusual locations

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\recycler\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\systemvolumeinformation\\\\'))) AND (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\tasks\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\debug\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\fonts\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\help\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\drivers\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\addins\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\cursors\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\tasks\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious process run from unusual locations

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment Reference: https://car.mitre.org/wiki/CAR-2013-05-002
